pages.title: Mana Linker
pages.text: The Mana Linker is a tool that you need to create a $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana Network/el. It can link blocks together that require, relay or provide $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el. To link one block to another, first right-click the receiving block to store its location. Then right-click the sending block to link both together. To clear coordinates from the Mana Linker, shift-right-click it.
